intro: Thamnochortus lewisiae, commonly known as the silverleaf dandelion, is a flowering plant native to South Africa. It is characterized by its silver-gray foliage and bright yellow flowers that bloom in spring. The plant belongs to the Asteraceae family and is often found in rocky or sandy soils. It has a compact growth habit and is well adapted to arid environments. Thamnochortus lewisiae is valued for its ornamental appeal and drought tolerance.
